title: Apple gives the right to repair*
description:
*Terms and conditions may apply. Recode's Rebecca Heilweil explains. 
Read Rebecca's story: https://www.vox.com/recode/22787724/apple-self-service-right-to-repair
This episode was produced by Taylor Maycan. The mix is by Melissa Pons from Hemlock Creek Productions. Adam Clark Estes hosted today's episode.
